data.name: AutoAddCCorBCCByKeywordInfo
data.value: Keywords that automatically add Ccs or Bccs.

data.name: AutoAddCCorBCCByMailAddressOrDomainInfo
data.value: Recipients or domains that automatically add Ccs or Bccs.

data.name: AutoCheckSameDomain
data.value: The internal domain recipients will be auto-checked.

data.name: CSVImportAlert
data.value: Don't import CSV file with wrong format.

data.name: ConfirmationMessage1
data.value: Would you like to send this email?

data.name: ConfirmationMessage2
data.value: After checking all items, you can press send button.

data.name: ForgottenToAttachAlert
data.value: The word "attached file" is in the text, but there is no attachment.

data.name: HowToDeleteRow
data.value: * Delete row: Select the row and press the delete key.

data.name: IfAllSameDomain
data.value: If all recipient's domains are internal domain, skip the confirmation window.

data.name: IfAllWhite
data.value: If there is no check target in the recipients, skip the confirmation window. (e.g., if all recipients are included in the allowlist.)

data.name: IsAlertAddressBccAlert
data.value: The recipients (Bcc) contains an address or domain that has been registered as an alert.

data.name: IsAlertAddressCcAlert
data.value: The recipients (Cc) contains an address or domain that has been registered as an alert.

data.name: IsAlertAddressMaybeIrrelevant
data.value: This recipient may be unrelated to the intended destination.

data.name: IsAlertAddressToAlert
data.value: The recipients (To) contains an address or domain that has been registered as an alert.

data.name: IsBigAttachedFile
data.value: There is a 10Mbyte or larger file attached to this email.

data.name: SelectSaveDestination
data.value: Select where you want to save it.

data.name: SendingForbidInfo
data.value: If you check this box, you can't send an email to the recipient or include the keyword.

data.name: SettingExampleAlertKeyword
data.value:
Keywords: Confidential Alerting text: It includes the phrase "Confidential".
Register the keywords to be alert and their alerting text.
If the alerting text is blank, the confirmation screen will show the default alerting text.

data.name: SettingExampleAlertMailAddress
data.value:
Email address: info@noraneko.co.jp or Domain: @noraneko.co.jp
Register an email address or domain.
If you send an email to an email address or domain that you have registered here, you will receive an alert in advance.

data.name: SettingExampleAutoAddCCorBCCByKeyword
data.value:
Type: Cc or Bcc Keywords: Confidential Email address: boss@noraneko.co.jp
When the keywords are included in the mail, The specified address is automatically added to the Cc or Bcc.

data.name: SettingExampleAutoAddCCorBCCByMailAddressOrDomain
data.value:
Type: Cc or Bcc To: warning@xxxxxxx.com Email address: boss@noraneko.co.jp
When sending mail to registered recipients and domains, The specified address is automatically added to the Cc or Bcc.

data.name: SettingExampleNameAndDomain
data.value:
Name: Noraneko Inc Domain: @noraneko.co.jp
Register the name (ex. Company name) and domain.
Displays a warning if the name in the email body and the recipients domain do not match.

data.name: SettingExampleWhiteList
data.value:
Email address: info@noraneko.co.jp or Domain: @noraneko.co.jp
Register Email address or domain.
The relevant recipients will be pre-checked in the confirmation screen.

data.name: ChangeRibbonLanguageInfo
data.value: The display language of the ribbon (menu) is updated when Outlook is restarted.

data.name: IsCanNotShowConfirmation
data.value: The confirmation window could not be displayed.

data.name: SendMailConfirmation
data.value: Would you like to send this email?

data.name: IsShowConfirmationToMultipleDomain
data.value: If the recipients contains multiple external domains, display the confirmation window. (Doesn't skip the confirmation window.)

data.name: IsSkipConfirmationInfo
data.value: Skip the confirmation window when you send an email only to the selected recipients.

data.name: SentOnBehalf
data.value: Send on behalf or Send As.

data.name: EnableForgottenToAttachAlert
data.value: If there is a sentence "attached file" in the text and there is no attached file, warn about that.

data.name: DeferredDeliveryEmailAddressOrDomainInfo
data.value: Enter the email address or domain you want to deferred delivery.

data.name: InputDeferredDeliveryTime
data.value: Enter the deferred time in minutes.

data.name: SettingExampleDeferredDelivery
data.value:
Email address: info@noraneko.co.jp or Domain: @noraneko.co.jp
Register your email address or domain and register the deferred time by the minute.
* If you register only @, you can register the standard deferred time of all mails.
* If multiple conditions are met, the longest deferred time will be applied.

data.name: AutoCheckMembersAddress
data.value: The members' email addresses will be auto-checked.

data.name: GetMembersOfTheContactGroup
data.value: Show the members of an Contact group.

data.name: GetMembersOfTheExDistList
data.value: Show the members of an Exchange distribution list. (It may take a long time.)

data.name: GetMembersOfTheList
data.value: Show the members of an Exchange distribution list or an Contact group

data.name: CanGetNewVersion
data.value: There is a new version of this add-in. Do you want to download it?

data.name: YouHaveLatest
data.value: This add-in is the latest version.

data.name: IsNotTreatedAsAttachmentsAtHtmlEmbeddedFiles
data.value: A file embedded in an HTML mail is not treated as an attachment.

data.name: SettingExampleAutoAddCCorBCCByAttachedFile
data.value:
Type: Cc or Bcc Email address: boss@noraneko.co.jp
When you send an email with a file attached, The specified address is automatically added to the Cc or Bcc.

data.name: CanceledSendingMailMessage
data.value:
Canceled sending this email. You can reedit this. The estimated time of sending this email has been cleared.
To send this email, you must click on the Send button. Closing the edit screen will not send this email.

data.name: SettingExampleInternalDomainList
data.value:
Domain: @noraneko.co.jp
Register a domain to be handled as an internal (company) domain.
The domain of the sender's email address is always treated as an internal domain.

data.name: IsDoNotUseXIfAllRecipientsAreInternalDomain
data.value: Disable this feature if the recipient's domains are all internal domains.

data.name: ExternalDomainsWarningAndAutoChangeToBcc
data.value: External domains warning and auto change to Bcc

data.name: IsAutoChangeToBccWhenLargeNumberOfExternalDomains
data.value: The external recipient of To and Cc are automatically converted to Bcc when the recipients (To/Cc) has a large number of external domains.

data.name: IsProhibitedWhenLargeNumberOfExternalDomains
data.value: Sending is prohibited when the recipients (To/Cc) has a large number of external domains.

data.name: IsWarningWhenLargeNumberOfExternalDomains
data.value: Displays a warning when the recipients (To/Cc) has a large number of external domains.

data.name: SettingExampleExternalDomainsWarningAndAutoChangeToBcc
data.value:
Set the number of external domains to be used as a basis for warnings and automatic change to Bcc, and turn each one on or off.
If the To does not exist after automatic change to Bcc, the sender's address will be automatically added to the To.

data.name: TargetToAndCcExternalDomainsNum
data.value: The number of external domains of the recipients (To/Cc) to be covered by this feature.

data.name: TargetToAndCcExternalDomainsNumInfo
data.value: * If the external domain included in the To and Cc of the email is greater than or equal to this setting, this feature will be applied.

data.name: AutoAddSendersAddressToAlert
data.value: The sender's Email address was automatically added to the To. (because the To no longer exists due to auto change to Bcc.)

data.name: ExternalDomainsChangeToBccAlert
data.value: As the external domains of To and Cc are above the threshold, the external domain recipients has been changed to Bcc.

data.name: LargeNumberOfExternalDomainAlert
data.value: The number of external domains in To and Cc is higher than the threshold. Please reconfirm the pros and cons of the sending.

data.name: ProhibitedWhenLargeNumberOfExternalDomainsAlert
data.value: The number of external domains in To and Cc is above the threshold.

data.name: DefaultAlertMessage
data.value: The warning keyword is included in the body of the email.

data.name: IsEnableRecipientsAreSortedByDomain
data.value: Recipients are sorted by domain on the confirmation screen.

data.name: AttachedIsAnEncryptedZipFile
data.value: Attached is an encrypted ZIP file.

data.name: IsEnableAllAttachedFilesAreDetectEncryptedZip
data.value: Attached files with an extension other than ".zip" also detect whether they are encrypted ZIP or not.

data.name: IsProhibitedWhenEncryptedZipIsAttached
data.value: Sending is prohibited when an encrypted ZIP file is attached.

data.name: IsWarningWhenEncryptedZipIsAttached
data.value: Display a warning when an encrypted ZIP file is attached.

data.name: NoticeOfIsEnableAllAttachedFilesAreDetectEncryptedZip
data.value: * The processing of emails with attachments may take longer.

data.name: SettingExampleAttachments
data.value: If an email has an encrypted ZIP file attached to it, you can display a warning or prohibit the sending of that email.
